name: Who Wants to be a Minimalist
name_original: Who Wants to be a Minimalist
description:
Made in a week for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3.
Theme: Less is More.

You're interested in being a minimalist, but first you must be the winner of a gameshow. You must prove that you have what it takes to be a minimalist, by sorting through a pile of objects to find whatever is on your list.

Controls:
Left Mouse Button - Pick up items (hold) / Drop items (release).

Credits:

Art - Pyrathae

Music - five

3D Models - Simple Items Cartoon Assets / Kdpx

Programming - Kdpx
